jobTitle: Class A CDL Truck Driver | Dedicated + Home Weekly | Northern CA to Seattle
jobDescription: HEARTLAND EXPRESSClass A CDL Driver | Dedicated from Lathrop to Portland/Seattle How about we get you home more often? We have a dedicated lane that's running the I-5 back and forth between Northern CA and Seattle. You'll get home every week and average 2,000 - 2,200 miles each week. If you live within 25 miles of the I-5 anywhere between Lathrop, CA to Tacoma, WA, submit an app today and we'll get you into a driving position you enjoy.
